text: Israeli vahera kumike vahe manizageno, kumi'mofo knamo zamazeri rentrako hu'ne. Havi zamavu'zamava nehaza vahe'mo'za zamagrira kasezmante'naze. Zamagra fatgo osu zamavu zamava nehaza vahe mani'ne'za, Ra Anumzana nenatre'za, ruotagema hunemofona kefenkami netre'za, Israeli vahe'mokizmi Ra Anumzana zamefi humi'naze.
